tool_description: Processes geophysical survey data including magnetic, gravity, electromagnetic, and resistivity measurements, applying filters and corrections.

data_file_path.description: Path to geophysical survey data file

survey_type.description: Type of geophysical survey: magnetic, gravity, electromagnetic, or resistivity

apply_corrections.description: Whether to apply standard corrections (IGRF, terrain, drift)

filter_type.description: Filter to apply: low_pass, high_pass, bandpass, or None

grid_spacing.description: Grid cell size for output grid in meters

error_messages: File not accessible: Ensure the geophysical data file path is valid and readable.
Unsupported survey type: Use one of [magnetic, gravity, electromagnetic, resistivity].
Invalid filter type: Use one of [low_pass, high_pass, bandpass] or None for no filtering.
Invalid grid spacing: Grid spacing must be a positive number greater than 0.
Insufficient data coverage: The survey data must have adequate spatial coverage for processing.
usage: Provide the geophysical data file path and specify the survey type. Optionally enable corrections, apply filters, and set grid spacing. The tool returns processed geophysical grids and statistics.

processed_stations.description: Number of geophysical measurement stations processed

processing_summary.description: Summary of processing steps applied and data quality
